update tb_contract_ticket set contract_id = #{contractId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, header = #{header,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, push_time = #{pushTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ticket_status = #{ticketStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, money = #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, proposer = #{proposer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, taxpayer_code = #{taxpayerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, registered_address = #{registeredAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, registered_phone = #{registeredPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, expersage = #{expersage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, bank_name = #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_account = #{bankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
